title: Ticket #5386: HTCondor View: fix afterquery error reporting
description:
The changes to support multiple graphs in one page haven't propogated to the afterquery error reporting. afterquery.wrap() is still assuming a global #vizchart and #vizstatus. Not a problem so long as everything keeps working, but makes dealing with errors harder. Should be fixed.

This may be simplier after #5387: HTCondor View: turn afterquery into a proper object
remarks:
2015-Nov-23 13:23:22 by adesmet:
Done. Each chart now has its own .vizlog where errors appear.
check_ins: 2015-Nov-17 15:50   Check-in [47937]: Afterquery is now (barely) a proper object. Early work for #5387 #5386 (By Alan De Smet )
creator: adesmet
